messageTypes.description: Travelor Information Message with up to 2 approaches for a curve.  Each approach has 4 regions.

configuration.description: The frequency to send the TIM in milliseconds.
The interval in milliseconds to keep a vehicle within a zone before allowing it to transition out of all zones.
Timeout in milliseconds when a vehicle is removed from all zones if a BSM has not been received.
TIM Plugin Log Level controls which log statements are printed to the terminal.

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provides, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
